body.section:
Maven for PHP uses the power of Maven for PHP project's build, reporting and documentation. It adapts the Maven build lifecycle to the PHP world. It fully supports PHP 4 and PHP 5. PHP for Maven uses PHPUnit for unit test and doxygen to create the api documentation.
Use a PHP library project to create an library which should be used from other PHP libraries or PHP web projects. Use a PHP web project for a standalone web project.
This links will help you to get started with Maven for PHP.

Download Maven

PHP library project - 5 minutes starter guide
Use the PHP library archetype for PHP libaries. These libaries can be used from other libaries or from PHP web projects.
PHP web project - 5 minutes starter guide
Use the PHP web archetype for PHP web projects. Use PHP libaries as dependencies.
